{"type":"text","timestamp":1771657743061,"sessionID":"ses_380f8c607ffe0l3JQZfwA8KHLo","part":{"id":"prt_c7f07771f001Y5qe0aWBCn757o","sessionID":"ses_380f8c607ffe0l3JQZfwA8KHLo","messageID":"msg_c7f073a8a0014T0bqlCDSicyV5","type":"text","text":"```dockerfile
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
# FRONTEND TARGET (React + Vite + Nginx)
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
FROM node:20-alpine AS frontend-builder

WORKDIR /app

COPY frontend/package*.json ./
RUN npm ci --only=production

COPY frontend/ ./
RUN npm run build

FROM nginx:1.25-alpine AS frontend

LABEL org.opencontainers.image.title="Frontend" \
      org.opencontainers.image.description="React frontend served by Nginx"

RUN addgroup -g 1001 -S appgroup && adduser -u 1001 -S appuser -G appgroup

WORKDIR /app

COPY --from=frontend-builder --chown=appuser:appgroup /app/dist /usr/share/nginx/html
COPY frontend/nginx.conf /etc/nginx/nginx.conf

EXPOSE 80

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
    CMD ["wget", "--no-verbose", "--tries=1", "--spider", "http://localhost:80/"]

USER appuser

CMD ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]

# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
# API TARGET (Go server)
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
FROM golang:1.22-alpine AS api-builder

WORKDIR /app

COPY api/go.mod api/go.sum ./
RUN go mod download

COPY api/ ./
RUN CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux go build -ldflags="-s -w" -o /server ./cmd/server

FROM gcr.io/distroless/static-debian12:nonroot AS api

LABEL org.opencontainers.image.title="API Server" \
      org.opencontainers.image.description="Go API server"

WORKDIR /app

COPY --from=api-builder /server /app/server

EXPOSE 8080

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
    CMD ["/app/server", "-health-check"]

USER nonroot:nonroot

ENTRYPOINT ["/app/server"]

# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
# WORKER TARGET (Python Celery)
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
FROM python:3.11-slim AS worker-builder

WORKDIR /app

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends gcc && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

COPY worker/requirements.txt ./
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir --user -r requirements.txt

FROM python:3.11-slim AS worker

LABEL org.opencontainers.image.title="Celery Worker" \
      org.opencontainers.image.description="Python Celery worker"

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends libpq5 && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* && \
    addgroup --gid 1001 appgroup && adduser --uid 1001 --gid 1001 --disabled-password --gecos "" appuser

WORKDIR /app

COPY --from=worker-builder /root/.local /home/appuser/.local
COPY worker/ ./

ENV PATH=/home/appuser/.local/bin:$PATH \
    PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1

RUN chown -R appuser:appgroup /app

USER appuser

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=10s --retries=3 \
    CMD ["python", "-c", "from celery import current_app; current_app.connection().ensure_connection(max_retries=3)"]

CMD ["celery", "-A", "worker", "worker", "--loglevel=info"]
